sections.title: Paladin (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Paladin class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Paladin)
sections.description: Paladins are proficient with all simple and martial weapons, all armor types (heavy, medium, light), and shields except tower shields.

sections.title: Aura of Good ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin radiates a good aura with power equal to her paladin level, detectable by detect good spells.

sections.title: Detect Evil [(Sp)](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Spell-Like-Abilities-Sp-) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin can use detect evil at will as a spell-like ability, or concentrate as a move action to study a single target within 60 feet.

sections.title: Smite Evil ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: As a swift action, the paladin can smite an evil target, adding Charisma bonus to attack rolls and paladin level to damage rolls, with extra damage against certain evil creatures and automatic DR bypass.

sections.title: Divine Grace ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin adds her Charisma bonus to all saving throws.

sections.title: Lay On Hands ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin can heal wounds by touch a limited number of times per day, healing 1d6 per two paladin levels, or deal damage to undead creatures.

sections.title: Aura of Courage ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin becomes immune to fear and grants allies within 10 feet a +4 morale bonus on saves against fear effects.

sections.title: Divine Health ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin becomes immune to all diseases, including supernatural and magical diseases like mummy rot.

sections.title: Mercy ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin can select mercies that add condition-removing effects to her lay on hands ability, with different mercies available at different levels.

sections.title: Channel Positive Energy ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin can channel positive energy like a cleric, consuming two uses of lay on hands and using her paladin level as effective cleric level.

sections.title: Spells (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin gains divine spellcasting from the paladin spell list, preparing spells in advance and using Charisma as the casting ability score.

sections.title: Divine Bond [(Sp)](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Spell-Like-Abilities-Sp-) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin forms a bond with either a weapon (gaining enhancement bonuses and special properties) or a mount (gaining an animal companion with special abilities).

sections.title: Aura of Resolve ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin becomes immune to charm effects and grants allies within 10 feet a +4 morale bonus on saves against charm effects.

sections.title: Aura of Justice ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin can expend two smite evil uses to grant smite evil to all allies within 10 feet for 1 minute.

sections.title: Aura of Faith ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin's weapons and attacks made within 10 feet of her are treated as good-aligned for overcoming damage reduction.

sections.title: Aura of Righteousness ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin gains DR 5/evil and immunity to compulsion effects, while granting allies within 10 feet a +4 morale bonus against compulsion.

sections.title: Holy Champion ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Paladin)
sections.description: The paladin's DR increases to 10/evil, smite evil can banish evil outsiders, and healing abilities always heal maximum amounts.

sections.title: Crusader Champion (Su) (Paladin)
sections.description: All of the paladin's aura ranges increase by 30 feet.
